author: Lost in Time
description:
Posters and clothes: https://lostintime.io/

In this video, we go back almost 2000 years to explore the beautiful city of Pompeii the last hours leading up to the eruption of Mount Vesuvius in year 79 AD. We'll go in to the gladiator arena, The Forum, see how the romans lived in their Roman Houses (Domus Romana), how they made wine and perfumes and finally the eruption.

I spent a long time making this video, so I really hope you enjoy it!

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:49 The Amphitheater (Gladiator Arena)
03:43 The Pompeii Forum
05:42 Roman Homes (Domus Romana)
08:13 Wine Production in Pompeii
09:29 Perfume Production
10:30 The Water System
12:28 The Eruption
title: The Final Hours of Pompeii
